snippet: A senior State Department official said French forces would be needed for counterterrorism operations in the north.
abstract: Senior State Department official says French military forces will likely be needed to carry out operations against militants in Mali even after United Nations peacekeeping force is organized to secure country.
lead_paragraph: A senior State Department official said French forces would be needed for counterterrorism operations in the north.

headline.seo: French Forces Needed Longer in Mali, U.S. Official Says
headline.main: Official Details French Role in Mali
headline.print_headline: Official Details French Role in Mali
